entry.title: Instructions for Surviving a Gotham Heatwave
entry.summary:
Author: ziptiesand

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,120Chapters: 3/22Kudos: 3

Summary: Clark is not getting the romantic summer vacation Bruce promised, and instead, has been assigned the company of one Zatanna Zatara while Bruce continues to work on the ever-important, ever-urgent case regarding a new and dangerous drug spreading across Gotham. The thing is, this would all be fine and normal, if Zatanna's heart wasn't constantly skipping a beat whenever Clark was around, or if she and Bruce weren't teetering on the edge of spilling their guts out to each other at any given moment.Meanwhile, Red Hood is on the verge of another Lazarus Pit-induced mental breakdown; Nightwing is only just starting to remember that his name is not, in fact, Ric Grayson; and neither of them are pleased with Batman at the moment, which may be just what they need to put their past behind them and start over as the people they want to be right now.It's going to be an interesting summer.
